title: ML: F1 Score Calculation
story: F1 score is the harmonic mean of precision and recall. It balances both metrics.
instructions: Calculate F1 score from precision=0.75 and recall=0.6. Formula: F1 = 2 * (P * R) / (P + R). Print rounded to 3 decimals.
starterCode:
import numpy as np

precision = 0.75
recall = 0.6

# Harmonic mean formula
f1 = 2 * (precision * recall) / (precision + recall)

print(round(f1, 3))
solutionHidden:
